eventDeatureData.Heading: Learn Designing a System for a Social Networking Site
eventDeatureData.paragraph1: System Design process is vital for creating efficient and user-friendly systems. It involves defining system elements like modules, architecture, components and their interfaces, as well as data, based on specified requirements. In order to provide a high-quality product that satisfies user needs, systems design considerations take into account both the commercial and technological requirements of clients.
eventDeatureData.paragraph2: Ready to deep dive into the field of System Design?
eventDeatureData.paragraph2_2: is hosting a FREE Masterclass on
eventDeatureData.paragraph3: to help bring clarity to System Design for Social Networking sites like Twitter . Register today to reserve your spot!
eventDeatureData.para3: What you will gain from this Masterclass
eventDeatureData.paragraph6: Design a solution for Data Modeling and Serve feeds
eventDeatureData.paragraph8: Learn User and Home Timeline Architecture
eventDeatureData.paragraph6_1: User timeline: Displaying user’s tweets and tweets user retweet
eventDeatureData.paragraph7_1: Home timeline: Displaying Tweets from people user follow
eventDeatureData.paragraph8_1: Search timeline: Display search results based on #tags or search keyword
eventDeatureData.paragraph8_2: The user should be able to follow another user
